column1: Just saw this, with NEW list of countries. https:/…20Jordan

This article mainly talks about Jordanians traveling back to Jordan from the listed countries. This topic is useful for foreigners: https:/…ShowTopic-g293985-i2131-k13263177-o20 Update_March_9_Corona_Virus_travel_restrictions-Jordan.html#105956800Patricia (Petra Bed & Breakfast - Horse Riding Jordan)

Very useful link, thank you !Patricia (Petra Bed & Breakfast - Horse Riding Jordan)
